array.name: or9or8or7or6or11or12or13or14
array.item: " Small NOT dangerous earthquake is going to pass through your region in 15 minutes "

" Stay tuned for a moderate earthquake coming in 15 minutes don't worry just get ready "\n • Predicted Effects Description - Felt indoors by some - Vibration similar to a passing\n truck - Not always recognized as an earthquake

array.name: or5or4or15or16
array.item: " Stay tuned for a moderate earthquake coming in 15 minutes don't worry just get ready "
• Predicted Effects Description - Felt indoors by many, outdoors by few - Awakens some sleeping people -\n Dishes, windows, and doors rattle, walls creak - Standing cars rock - Hanging objects swing

array.name: or3or17
array.item: " Major earthquake is coming to your region in 15 minutes stay under a table "

• Predicted Effects Description - Felt indoors by mostly everyone, outdoors by many -
 Awakens most sleeping people - Some dishes break, windows and plaster walls crack -
 Small unstable objects overturned - Hanging objects and doors swing considerably,
 pictures knocked out of plumb - Some liquid spilled from full containers

array.name: or2or1or18or19
array.item: "A great earthquake is coming to your region in 15 minutes evacuate the building and\n stay in the street "

• Predicted Effects Description - Felt by everyone - General excitement and some fear -
 Slight damage to poorly built structures - Considerable amount of glassware and windows
 broken - Some furniture overturned, and some heavy furniture moved - Pictures and books
 fall from walls and shelves - Some fallen plaster and damaged chimneys

array.name: or0or20ormorethan20
array.item: " A super earthquake is coming to your region in 15 minutes evacuate the city and find\n some open area it will be less dangerous "

• Predicted Effects Description - Severe damage to well-built wooden structures, most
 masonry structures and foundations destroyed, well-built brick walls cracked - Bridges
 severely damaged or destroyed - Ground severely cracked - Considerable landslides from
 steep slopes and riverbanks - Water splashes over banks of canals, rivers, and lakes -
 Underground pipes broken - Open cracks and wavy patterns in concrete and asphalt - Railroad tracks slightly bent
